articles.title: 'Sirens Sounding Across Israel': Iran Launches Fresh Missile Barrage Post US Airstrikes
creator: ABP Live News
articles.description: Tensions in the Middle East have escalated sharply as Iran launched fresh missile strikes on Israel just hours after US forces joined Israel‚Äôs military offensive and destroyed three major Iranian nuclear sites.On Sunday, Tehran fired 27 missiles in two waves targeting Haifa and Tel Aviv, injuring at least 11 people. The Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) claimed responsibility, stating that Ben Gurion Airport near Tel Aviv was also among the targets.‚ÄúSirens sounding across Israel due to another Iranian missile launch,‚Äù the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) confirmed in a post on X.US Strikes Obliterate Iran‚Äôs Nuclear SitesIran‚Äôs latest attacks came shortly after US President Donald Trump announced that American forces had bombed three crucial Iranian nuclear facilities ‚Äî Fordow, Natanz, and Isfahan.A US official told Reuters that B-2 bombers carried out the strikes. In a televised address, Trump declared, ‚ÄúThe strikes were a spectacular military success. Iran's key nuclear enrichment facilities have been completely and totally obliterated.‚ÄùCalling Iran the ‚Äúbully of the Middle East,‚Äù the President added, ‚Äúmust now make peace. If they do not, future attacks will be far greater and a lot easier.‚Äù üö®Sirens sounding across Israel due to another Iranian missile launchüö®‚Äî Israel Defense Forces (@IDF) June 22, 2025Ongoing Escalation Since FridayThe fierce exchange of missile and drone attacks between Iran and Israel erupted last Friday when the Israeli military launched ‚ÄúOperation Rising Lion‚Äù and carried out strikes on Iranian cities. Israel claimed the offensive was necessary after concluding that Tehran was on the verge of developing a nuclear weapon.Netanyahu Praises Trump‚Äôs ‚ÄúBold Decision‚ÄùIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu applauded President Trump for the US airstrikes, calling it a historic move that would reshape the future.‚ÄúCongratulations, President Trump. Your bold decision to target Iran's nuclear facilities with the awesome and righteous might of the United States will change history,‚Äù Netanyahu said in a video address.He continued, ‚ÄúIn Operation Rising Lion, Israel has done truly amazing things, but in tonight's action against Iran's nuclear facilities, America has been unsurpassed ‚Äî it has done what no other country on Earth could do. History will record that President Trump acted to deny the world's most dangerous regime ‚Äî the world's most dangerous weapons.‚ÄùNetanyahu described Trump‚Äôs leadership as creating a ‚Äúpivot of history that can help lead the Middle East and beyond to a future of prosperity and peace.‚Äù He concluded with, ‚ÄúGod bless America. God bless Israel. May God bless our unshakeable alliance, our unbreakable faith.‚Äù
